entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers ending this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this evening then becoming west 70 gusting to 90. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly cloudy. High 7 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
